Warehouse Keeper Daisy:
Hugin, Durin, Lunin are my brothers. Although all of us are members of the same guild, we are living in different parts of the world. But we always keep in touch!
Family is the most important thing. You have to care about your relatives and have respect for them. Do you want to send a mail to your family? Then delivery sevice is at your disposal! Also I'd be happy to take your belongings for safekeeping.
